VARDESC: Did acute GVHD develop since the date of last report?
Did acute GVHD persist since the date of last report?
Maximum overall grade of acute GVHD
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Did acute GVHD persist since the date of last report\" = \"Yes\""
VALUES: I - Rash on < 50% of skin, no liver or gut involvement
column18: II - Rash on > 50% of skin, bilirubin 2-3 mg/dL, or diarrhea 500-1000 mL/day or persistent nausea or vomiting
column19: Ill - Bilirubin 3-15 mg/dL, or gut stage 2-4 diarrhea > 1000 mL/day or severe abdominal pain with or without ileus
column20: IV - Generalized erythroderma with bullous formation, or bilirubin > 15 mg/dL
column21: Not applicable (acute GVHD present but cannot be graded)

VARDESC: Date maximum overall grade of acute GVHD
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Did acute GVHD persist since the date of last report\" = \"Yes\""

VARDESC: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Skin
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Did acute GVHD persist since the date of last report\" = \"Yes\""
VALUES: Stage 0 - no rash, no rash attributable to acute GVHD
column18: Stage 1 - maculopapular rash, < 25% of body surface
column19: Stage 2 - maculopapular rash, 25-50% of body surface
column20: Stage 3 - generalized erythroderma, > 50% of body surface
column21: Stage 4 - generalized erythroderma with bullae formation and/or desquamation

VARDESC: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Lower intestinal tract (use mL/day for adult recipients and mL/kg/day for pediatric recipients)
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Did acute GVHD persist since the date of last report\" = \"Yes\""
VALUES: Stage 0 - no diarrhea, no diarrhea attributable to acute GVHD /diarrhea< 500 mL/day (adult), or <10 mL/kg/day (pediatric)
column21: Stage 4 - severe abdominal pain, with or without ileus, and/or grossly bloody stool

VARDESC: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Upper instestinal tract
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Did acute GVHD persist since the date of last report\" = \"Yes\""
VALUES: Stage 0 - no persistent nausea or vomiting

VARDESC: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Liver
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Did acute GVHD persist since the date of last report\" = \"Yes\""
VALUES: Stage 0 - No liver acute GVHD / bilirubin < 2.0 mg/dL (< 34 µmol/L)

VARDESC: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Other site(s) involved with acute GVHD
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Did acute GVHD persist since the date of last report\" = \"Yes\""

VARDESC: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Other site(s) involved with acute GVHD. Specify:
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Other site(s) involved with acute GVHD\" = \"Yes\""

VARDESC: Did chronic GVHD develop since the date of last report?
Date of chronic GVHD diagnosis - date estimated
Did chronic GVHD persist since the date of last report?
Maximum grade of chronic GVHD {according to best clinical judgment)
Specify if chronic GVHD was limited or extensive
VALUES: Limited - localized skin involvement and/or liver dysfunction
column18: Extensive - one or more of the following:
column20: liver histology showing chronic aggressive hepatitis, bridging necrosis or cirrhosis; or,
column21: involvement of eye: Schirmer's test with < 5 mm wetting; or
column22: involvement of minor salivary glands or oral mucosa demonstrated on labial biopsy; or
column23: involvement of any other target organ

VARDESC: Date of maximum grade of chronic GVHD
